text.section: A majority of the full authorized membership of the Board is a quorum.
The Board shall meet at least twice a year, at the times and places that it determines.

Each member of the Board is entitled to:
Compensation determined by the Secretary in accordance with the State budget, unless the member otherwise is a public employee; and
Reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
The Board may employ a staff in accordance with the State budget.
